casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Joseph PETRICK, Petitioner No. 197 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 29, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 29 th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED , LIMITED TO the issue listed below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue as stated by Petitioner is:

Whether this Court should grant this petition for allowance of appeal in order to determine whether the courts below had the authority to direct payment of restitution which obligation has been previously discharged in his bankruptcy?
